questions.question: What is the Go module name in go.mod? (Provide the module name)
What Go version is specified in go.mod? (Provide the version number)
How many executable services are in the cmd/ directory? (Provide the count)
How many packages with actual code used by the services are in the internal/common/ directory? (Provide the count)
How many external package dependencies are listed in go.mod? (Provide the count)
How many *_test.go files are in the repository? (Provide the count)
How many aggregators are defined in the build system? (Provide the count)
What is the default port for the API Gateway service? (Provide the port number)
What is the default port for the Auth Service? (Provide the port number)
What web framework package is used for HTTP routing? (Provide the full package name as it appears in go.mod)
How many components are built in this repository? (Provide the count)
What source files does the api-gateway component use? (Provide a list)
What source files does the user-service component use? (Provide a list)
What external packages does the api-gateway component use? (Provide a list of full package names as they appear in go.mod)
What external packages does the user-service component use? (Provide a list of full package names as they appear in go.mod or their source)
What programming language does the auth-service component use? (Provide the language name)
What programming languages does the user-service component use? (Provide a comma-separated list or space-separated list)
What is the name of the Scala library component? (Provide the component name)
What component does java-utils depend on? (Provide the component name)
What component does user-service depend on? (Provide the component name)
What is the maximum dependency depth in this repository? (i.e., the longest chain from any component to its deepest dependency)
List all components (including transitive dependencies) that user-service depends on. (Provide a list)
If the scala-utils library fails to build, which components would also fail? (Provide a list)
If the java-utils library fails to build, which components would be affected? (Provide a list)
Which components can be built first because they have zero dependencies on other components in this repository? (Provide a list)
Can api-gateway and auth-service be built in parallel? (Answer yes or no)
What does the deploy aggregator depend on? (Provide a list)
Which external package is used by the most components? (Provide the full package name as it appears in go.mod. If multiple packages are tied, provide any one of them)
What components does the build-all aggregator build? (Provide a list of service names)
In what order must scala-utils, java-utils, and user-service be built? (Provide the build order as a list starting with the component that has no dependencies)

correlation.pattern: Agents with higher baseline show less improvement from RIG

time_reduction_vs_score_improvement.correlation_note: No clear correlation between time reduction and score improvement
